<p>The OSC's Scientific Board now has a new speaker: <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/plesnila/index.html" title="Plesnila">Prof. Dr. Nikolaus Plesnila</a>. Additionally <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/straub/index.html" title="Straub">Dr. Tobias Straub</a> has joined the Scientifc Board as <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/ludwig/index.html" title="Ludwig">Prof. Dr. Ralf Ludwig</a> has stepped down from the board.</p>
<p>More information about the members of the OSC's Scientific Board can be found <a href="../../about_us/board/index.html" title="Scientific Board">here</a>.</p>
